sent.orig: As she gave in to her misery, there was a fleeting thought: I'll cry tonight.
sent.trans: 悲痛不已的她脑子里闪过一个想法：我今晚要痛哭一场。

sent.orig: There is no greater grief than to recall a time of ha ine when in misery.
sent.trans: 没有比在悲惨中回忆幸福的时刻更痛苦。

sent.orig: Every moment of the fashion industry's misery is richly deserved by the designers and magazine poltroons who perpetuate this absurd creation.
sent.trans: 时装工业每一个痛苦的时刻都是完全应该被时装设计师们…和那些使这种荒诞创造永久化的杂志懦夫领受。

sent.orig: He ignored the public ostentation of his time, as well as the private misery.
sent.trans: 他忽视了当时在社会上流行的卖弄浮夸和一般平民的悲困痛苦。
